header.description: Report header scalars: date range labels and generation timestamp. All three are parameter/runtime values, not sourced from catalog columns.

rows.description: All key-value pairs from the app_meta table, one row per metadata entry.

totals.description: No totals required for this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are pass-through display parameters shown in the report header and footer — they do NOT filter the app_meta rows. generated_at is a server-injected runtime constant. No catalog filters are applied.
transformations: No reshape required — app_meta is a flat key-value table; all rows are projected directly as row_key and row_value.
